MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Folder splitting, Splitting with Compressing, Advanced easy of use

English.Keywords: Split, program, file, directory, folder, piece, mp3, montage, compress
English.Char_Desc_45: 3. version of Paramparca. For your files...
English.Char_Desc_80: For split your files and folders. And for mp3 montage... Just Quick & Easy
English.Char_Desc_250: Very handy & useful, multi-function splitter program. Unlimited & 100% free for you. You can compress & split your large files and folders to a size you need. Besides you can crop any part of your mp3 track you want.
English.Char_Desc_450: Very handy & useful, multi-function splitter program. Unlimited & 100% free for you. You can compress & split your large files and folders to a size you need. Besides you can crop any part of your mp3 track you want. Paramparca is a little giant program that will bring speed and easiness to your daily life. Henceforth file transfer with e-mail or disc is completely easy, safe and really fast...
English.Char_Desc_2000: Very handy & useful, multi-function splitter program. Unlimited & 100% free for you. You can compress & split your large files and folders to a size you need. Besides you can crop any part of your mp3 track you want. Paramparca is a little giant program that will bring speed and easiness to your daily life. Henceforth file transfer with e-mail or disc is completely easy, safe and really fast...
